name: Deeper Down Dungeons
description:
The PC version of  Deeper Down Dungeon, a strategical dungeon crawling game where you are challenged to defeat the monstrous rulers of five dungeons, ruins populated by vicious creatures, precious treasures and clever puzzles. 

Visit the town to collect bounties, buy potions, sharpen your sword and choose your talents. 

Vanquish each dungeon with increased difficulties to fully reveal the hidden lore of these mysterious places.

Good luck Adventurer!
